Handmade rugs

Our offer

Welcome to our Guten Rug tufting studio. Here you will find unique, stylish and handmade rugs that will perfectly fit your home or apartment. Discover our projects and get inspired.

Create your unique rug

Contact us and share your vision of the perfect rug. You can even provide your own image. We will prepare a detailed timeline and cost estimate for you.

Purchase rug

Browse and select from our collection of pre-designed rugs.
